original_text: Now Joshua was dressed in filthy clothes as he stood before the angel.
korean_text: 여호수아가 더러운 옷을 입고 천사 앞에 서 있는지라

sentences.original_text: Now Joshua was dressed in filthy clothes
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 여호수아는 더러운 옷을 입고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: as he stood before the angel
